/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
